iConcierge Services is committed to prot: iConcierge Services is committed to protecting any information we collect about you. The privacy of our clients is of utmost importance to us at all times. The purpose of this Privacy Policy is to describe what information iConcierge collects about you and how that information is used.
We collect personal information about yo: We collect personal information about you when you engage the services of iConcierge, This will include your name, address, email address, telephone numbers, payment details, credit card details, and billing addresses.
We understand this information is highly: We understand this information is highly sensitive. Thus, this information is never shared with third parties and is for the use of iConcierge only. We hold details of current and finished client requirements and we also hold feedback on or from clients and suppliers.
iConcierge will make any information hel: iConcierge will make any information held on our clients and suppliers available to the client or supplier in question and undertake to correct it, if needed.We will also remove any personal information from our database at the request of the client and supplier concerned if requested to do so.Requests for access to individual information or removal of information should be made in writing to iConcierge 84513, D-006 El Kafr, El Gouna, Red Sea province, Egypt Or by email to info@iconciergeeg.com
iConcierge only uses your personal infor: iConcierge only uses your personal information for the original purposes it was given.iConcierge will not disclose, use, give or sell any personal information to third parties for any purposes other than to our suppliers and other third parties who need to know in order to deliver services on behalf of iConcierge unless required to do so by law.
iConcierge does not use cookies, if howe: iConcierge does not use cookies, if however at any such time in the future we introduce the use of cookies our clients and suppliers will be informed within 30 days notice by email.
By accepting our Terms and Conditions an: By accepting our Terms and Conditions and using the services provided by iConcierge, you consent to the collection and use of your personal data by iConcierge for the purposes outlined above and for any other purpose which is reasonably necessary for us to provide proper services in accordance with our Terms and Conditions.
